title: Typeface being used in Banana Republic stores
content:
Hi,

Can anyone identify the typeface being used in the attached image. It's being used by Banana Republic in their stores on artful signage. Sorry in advance for the blurriness.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806125619im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2436_6669.JPG)
author: bfingeroth

comments.content: Is it Helvetica Neue Condensed Bold?

I think you're right. I realized as soon as I tried the Helvetica R I was wrong. It feels slightly bolder than TG Bold Cond 20 but don't think it could be anything else because that's the boldest condensed TG has right?

Thanks Ryuk!
